entries.title: Art McNally, NFL’s ‘father of instant replay,’ dies at 97
entries.description: Mr. McNally embraced video technology as another set of eyes on the field.

entries.title: Tech workers had their pick of jobs for years. That era is over for now.
entries.description: Tech companies have slashed hundreds of thousands of jobs, flooding the labor market with skilled talent who are competing for the same positions.

entries.title: Two years after Jan. 6, Meta mulls if Trump is still a threat
entries.description: Trump is still unrepentant about his claims of election fraud in the 2020 vote. Does that mean he's unfit for Facebook?

entries.title: U.S. subpoenas hedge funds in probe of crypto exchange Binance
entries.description: The federal probe into Binance is unfolding at a time of deep uncertainty in the crypto industry.

entries.title: Next in AI’s ‘gold rush’: Military, regulations and endless chatbots
entries.description: In 2023, the AI hype will likely continue and the problems that it has probably won’t be solved.
